mean_cn: v. 把（衬衫、餐巾等的）边塞到里面，把…夹入，把…藏入；  n. （衣服等的）褶，裥
mean_en: to push the end of (something, such as a piece of cloth or paper) into or behind something in order to hold it in place, make it look neat, etc.
sentence: I tucked my blouse into my skirt to look presentable.
sentence_trans: 我把衬衫塞进短裙里，这样比较好看。
